info_text: My name is Krzysztof Szymała, I am a cognitive science student at the University of Silesia in Katowice. My research concerns differences in the perception of visual stimuli between meditating and non-meditating individuals. It is part of my master's thesis, titled 'The influence of meditation techniques on selected cognitive processes in humans.' Participation in the study will help in exploring the impact of meditation on our perceptual abilities.
training_instructions_text: You will see a series of images displayed on the screen. After each image, you will be asked a question about what was shown. If you are not sure about the answer, please do not guess – select 'I don't know'. Make sure to perform the experiment in a well-lit room. If it is nighttime, it is recommended to turn on the light to ensure good visibility conditions.
training_question: What did you see in the image?
experiment_instructions_text: You will see a series of images displayed on the screen with different exposure times. After each image, you will be asked a question about what was shown. If you are not sure about the answer, please do not guess – select 'I don't know'. Make sure to perform the experiment in a well-lit room. If it is nighttime, it is recommended to turn on the light to ensure good visibility conditions.
experiment_question: What did you see in the image?

results.thanks: Thank you for participating in the study!
